expo.name: Nova The Starbook
expo.description: An AR-powered card collection app for Nova cards. Scan and collect your favorite Nova cards with augmented reality technology.

infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Nova The Starbook needs access to your photo library to save AR scanned card images
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Nova The Starbook needs permission to save scanned  card images to your photo library
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Nova The Starbook uses your camera to scan and recognize Nova  cards with AR technology
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Nova The Starbook may use your microphone for AR sound effects and card scanning feedback

plugins.cameraPermission: This app needs access to camera to take photos of real world for AR
plugins.microphonePermission: This app needs access to microphone to record audio for AR
